item.title: Lossless Scaling Configuration for Emulators
item.author: axekinn@proton.me (Axekin)
item.description:
Lossless Scaling Configuration for Emulators

Author: Axekin(axekinn@proton.me)

Maximize your FPS on emulators with Lossless Scaling. Detailed configuration guide for Switch, PS2, PS3 with frame generation and upscaling.

Published on 2025-10-07 at Wiki of Axekin, last modified on 2025-10-07
